description: Returns configuration data for the specified CloudFormation extensions, from the CloudFormation registry for the account and Region. For more information, see Edit configuration data for extensions in your account in the CloudFormation User Guide.

parameters.name: TypeConfigurationIdentifiers
parameters.description: The list of identifiers for the desired extension configurations. (dict) --- Identifying information for the configuration of a CloudFormation extension. TypeArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the extension, in this account and Region. For public extensions, this will be the ARN assigned when you call the ActivateType API operation in this account and Region. For private extensions, this will be the ARN assigned when you call the RegisterType API operation in this account and Region. TypeConfigurationAlias (string) --- The alias specified for this configuration, if one was specified when the configuration was set. TypeConfigurationArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the configuration, in this account and Region. Type (string) --- The type of extension. TypeName (string) --- The name of the extension type to which this configuration applies.

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: A list of information concerning any errors generated during the setting of the specified configurations.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message.

nested_items.name: TypeConfigurationIdentifier
nested_items.description: Identifying information for the configuration of a CloudFormation extension.

nested_items.name: TypeArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the extension, in this account and Region.

nested_items.name: TypeConfigurationAlias
nested_items.description: The alias specified for this configuration, if one was specified when the configuration was set.

nested_items.name: TypeConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the configuration, in this account and Region.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of extension.

nested_items.name: TypeName
nested_items.description: The name of the extension type to which this configuration applies.

nested_items.name: UnprocessedTypeConfigurations
nested_items.description: A list of any of the specified extension configurations that CloudFormation could not process for any reason.

nested_items.name: TypeArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the extension, in this account and Region.

nested_items.name: TypeConfigurationAlias
nested_items.description: The alias specified for this configuration, if one was specified when the configuration was set.

nested_items.name: TypeConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the configuration, in this account and Region.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of extension.

nested_items.name: TypeName
nested_items.description: The name of the extension type to which this configuration applies.

nested_items.name: TypeConfigurations
nested_items.description: A list of any of the specified extension configurations from the CloudFormation registry.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the configuration data, in this account and Region.

nested_items.name: Alias
nested_items.description: The alias specified for this configuration, if one was specified when the configuration was set.

nested_items.name: Configuration
nested_items.description: A JSON string specifying the configuration data for the extension, in this account and Region.

nested_items.name: LastUpdated
nested_items.description: When the configuration data was last updated for this extension.

nested_items.name: TypeArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the extension, in this account and Region.

nested_items.name: TypeName
nested_items.description: The name of the extension.

nested_items.name: IsDefaultConfiguration
nested_items.description: Whether this configuration data is the default configuration for the extension.
